fixes.name: Select Current YTD vs Last YTD
fixes.dax_expression: YEAR('Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Order Date]) >= YEAR(TODAY()) - 1 && (MONTH('Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Order Date]) < MONTH(TODAY()) || (MONTH('Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Order Date]) = MONTH(TODAY()) && DAY('Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Order Date]) <= DAY(TODAY())))
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau date component comparisons to DAX using YEAR, MONTH, DAY and TODAY. Replaced logical operators (AND->&&, OR->||) and equality (==->=). References to [Order Date] mapped to 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Order Date]. This is row-level boolean logic, so implemented as a calculated column.
